pkgmetadata.longdescription: A set of modules for analyzing and playing with the mechanics of python pickles. Features: * Forgiving: Extracts as much data as possible from the pickle, even if class definitions are unavailable. * Safe: You can safely unpickle data structures from unknown sources * Easy to use: Tools are provided which make it possible to code around the unpickled datastructures as if they were created from the actual class definitions. * Customizeable: Most functionality is easily subclassable to suit your needs. * Create pickles as if you were writing python: Via a few constructs it's possible to create custom pickles with the ease of writing normal python. * Works in both python 2 and 3
